short_desc: Provides programs of individual and group counseling and education for first offenders and multiple offenders convicted of driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs
description: Provides programs for individuals convicted of driving under the influence of drugs or alcohol (DUI). First offender program offers 30 and 40 hours of individual and group counseling and education sessions. Multiple offender program varies in length according to court order.DUBLIN:  Wet and Wreckless offers: 12 hour, 6 month, 9 month and 18 month programs offered  in English and in Spanish.OAKLAND: Both first and multiple offenders, in English and in Spanish. Also offers anger management services.UNION CITY: Both first and multiple offenders, in English and in Spanish.
